'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a quest item in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Usage

* May either be returned to [Degnos](/degnos/), or opened via the examine menu of the item. Opening the satchel will give you [Avetta's Seal](/avettasSeal/), [Suspicious Letter](/suspiciousLetter/), a [Dagger](/daggerDeadfire/), and a [Rauatai Hat](/rauataiHat/), however this has consequences for the associated quest – [Sealed Fate](/sealedFate/).

'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a quest item in {{poe2}}.

== Description ==
{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

== Acquisition ==
{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

==Usage==
* May either be returned to [[Degnos]], or opened via the examine menu of the item. Opening the satchel will give you [[Avetta's Seal]], [[Suspicious Letter]], a [[Dagger (Deadfire)|Dagger]], and a [[Rauatai Hat]], however this has consequences for the associated quest – [[Sealed Fate]].
